Detailed Description

lsm_field_extension3d.h provides support for computing the right-hand side of the field extension equation in three space dimensions.

Define Documentation

#define LSM3D_COMPUTE_FIELD_EXTENSION_EQN_RHS   lsm3dcomputefieldextensioneqnrhs_

LSM3D_COMPUTE_FIELD_EXTENSION_EQN_RHS() computes right-hand side of the field extension equation when it is written in the form:

Arguments:

  • rhs (out): right-hand side of field extension equation
  • S (in): field to be extended off of the zero level set
  • phi (in): level set function used to compute normal vector
  • S_*_upwind (in): upwind spatial derivatives for
  • signed_normal_* (in): signed normal
  • dx, dy, dz (in): grid spacing
  • *_gb (in): index range for ghostbox
  • *_fb (in): index range for fillbox

Return value: none

NOTES:

  • phi requires at least one ghost cell.
